name: Hungry Caveman (EduardoMonroy)
description:
Hungry Caveman by Eduardo Monroy

In Hungry Caveman,  You accompany a caveman in his search for food. Join him in his prehistoric adventure through the dangerous forest full of obstacles he must jump and climb through to finally fill his stomach. 

Credits:

Game Art : Jungle Pack by Jesse Munguia  https://jesse-m.itch.io/jungle-pack

Mechanics code: Michael Baker - University of Texas at Austin

Level Design: Eduardo Monroy

Caveman Redesign: Eduardo Monroy

Skeleton & Meat Art Asset: Eduardo Monroy

Music: Double the Bits by TeknoAXE  http://teknoaxe.com/Link_Code_3.php?q=1178
